current.question: Based on this SPACE fact: 'The Sun makes up 99.86% of our solar system's mass!', which statement is TRUE?

options.A: This space fact is completely accurate
options.B: This space fact has been proven false
options.C: This space fact is still being debated by scientists

current.explanation: This is a verified space fact that has been confirmed by multiple astronomical observations and calculations.
current.wow_fact: 🚀 **MARVELOUS FACT:** The footprints on the Moon will last for 100 million years!
